lead_paragraph: BODENMANN--Hans U. Members of The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art are saddened to learn of the passing of Hans U. Bodenmann of Basel, Switzerland on January 29. Our deepest sympathies are extended to Maja Oeri, a beloved member of the International Council and a trustee of The Museum of Modern Art, and to Hans and Maja's sons Emanuel and Melchior. Agnes Gund, Chair Sharon Percy Rockefeller, President Jo Carole Lauder, President Emerita, The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BODENMANN, HANS U

snippet: BODENMANN--Hans U. Members of The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art are saddened to learn of the passing of Hans U. Bodenmann of Basel, Switzerland on January 29. Our deepest sympathies are extended to Maja Oeri, a beloved member of the International Council and a trustee of The Museum of Modern Art, and to Hans and Maja's sons Emanuel and Melchior. Agnes Gund, Chair Sharon Percy Rockefeller, President Jo Carole Lauder, President Emerita, The International Council of The Museum of Modern Art 1/3
